column3: “Space Dawg was a strain I picked up because my Bud-tender recommended it to me. I asked for something that would put me to sleep and reduce pain and that's exactly what it did. The smell is very strong. The kind of bud that as soon as you open the jar the room reaks. Fuelly smell with a sweet taste. Had me really spacey for about 30 minutes as I finished up the movie I had been watching than it put me right to sleep....”
“If you really wanna relax, take a ME" day
column4: or just fall back into the REM sleep statis...choose Space Dawg. 1-2 bowls will knock you rite back to sleep
column6: I suggest not driving. Space Dawg has got to be one of my favorite flowers
column7: next to Cherry Pie in Indica's
column8: to all you readers out there
column9: DON'T PASS UP THE OPPORTUNITY TO TRY THIS FLOWER!!!”"

column3: “I really enjoy this strain. Nice size nugz, dense but not rock hard. I was surprised 2 taste the suttle notes of bubble gum towards the end of exhaling.  Leafly has done a great job so far of trying their best to describe each and every strain there is out there. (theres alot lol!) So Thank you LEAFLY 4 ALL your hard work. LOVE&PEACE ♡♡♡”

“Heavily crystal laden and pretty potent, this strain is an excellent choice of nighttime medicine. Just smoked a bowl and it's incredibly smooth, buzz isn't too heavy and on exhale you get the fruity/skunky notes... very tasty”

“Love this one!
Space Dawg helps very much with pain and stress! Just 3-5 tokes.   I feel a little lazy but can still find enough ambition (if I don't smoke too much) to start something and stay focused.”

“This funky smelling bud looked slightly stringy but covered in crystals. the stringiness didnt deter me because my guy only supplies 100% medical stuff to me. glad i picked it up, this packs a powerful and uplifting head high, without creating sluggishness smoking it after a long days work (butcher) in the evening. it actually tastes better than the flowers smell, and totally melts away your stress and fatigue at the...”

“I tried this from a friend, and wasn't disappointed. Hit me fast, made me cough, left me with a lasting high. Definitely can feel the indica effects, and did make me giggly. Not a strain I would smoke if I needed to be going about my day. More of a night time, or laid-back party/chilling strain.”

“This is some forreal bomb ars indica! I was contemplating purchasing this strain just because of the name, but good googooly moogooly this strain is Juiceeeeee, ha ha. On a serious note, I suffer from neck pain and left shoulder pain from a bad muscle strain playing Pool, within the first  minutes of smoking a firmly tightened joint, I immediately feel the tension lifting up and I'm able to type reviews like such! A ...”

“Aha check it nice very smooth smoke plenty of course followed by all of a sudden i realize that i am a big dog in a space suit on my hind legs waiting to be deployed somewhere in outer space. Then the helmet's face sheild came down really smooth and from there i am in a kennel with all these dawgs in a space suits...#Connoisseur.”
“Strong, borderline psychedelic.”
“I the it work nausea and this made it worse”

“Picked this up from the store two days ago, and tried it out the bong and OMG! Amazing high!, also great to
listing to music.”
“Best bud smoked yet in the 12 years I have been smoking.”
“Such a great Indica.”
“Good for anxiety, alright for daytime use.”
“Was feeling really horrible today (dizzy, nauseous, migraine) so I smoked this and was able to get up and go grocery shopping. Fantastic weed. Would definitely smoke again.”

“This was a great Strain that gave me a very powerful indica high,I was very relaxed and stress free when i sat in the couch after our session,Also great for your apetite had great munchie time with this!”

“Space dawg is the perfect chill weed. It relaxes both your body and mind. 
This weed offers great meditative purposes as well, the kind where you just relax and think about really deep shit.”
“Complex flavors that change a little every day, hashy expanding hit with fruity overtones and sour ting that lasts for a while. space queen pheno isnt as pungent but dripping in trichs.”

“My favorite all time daytime med. It kind of had a reverse effect of most indica dominant hybrids and gave me the most pain free energy I have had since before my back injuries. Phenotypes varied slightly in smell (juicy fruit gum to rotted fruit mixed with vomit) but the effect was vet stable. I grew my own and consistently was in the low 18% s for thc.”
“Good head high...great for day time and night time use...only downfall is I had to smoke alot to get high...I've had better but still a decent strain.”

“This is probably the most aptly named strain I have come across. I vaped about 1/4 gram and proceeded to stare at my aquarium for about 10 mins before I realized I was even doing it. It's not spacey in a heavy stoned way but more in a clean soft way that just let's your mind wander. A lot of strains that have this kind of mind wandering effect make me a little anxious and stressed ( running all the things I need to d...”

“Best indica dominant strain I’ve had.  Vaporized in a Flowermate v5.0s.  Produced far more vapor than other strains I have had.  I was able to revape a few times on a single fill of my Flowermate.

Flavor best described as sweet fresh cut grass, I do not mean this in a negative way, the flavor is by no means unpleasant.”
“Yea this stuff is good. Just chills and relaxes ya”
“Very good the aroma is very pleasant”
“Long, fingery nugs look like a sativa but sedate like an indica. Faint smell of root beer. Packs quite a punch! Sadly makes my mouth incredibly dry about 20 minutes in.”
“IT'S THE BOMB!”
“Love space Queen so had to try this and it's working great. ..loaded with crystals very stony. ..sleep comes to us all lol”

“Space Dawg is great for chilling out and listening to music or playing video games. A potent indica with a piney, fruity aroma, Space Dawg's powerful body high melted my anxiety and depression. Not my go-to for sleep (Yoda OG wins out in that category), I prefer the Dawg for its euphoric and relaxing effects. Definitely a unique strain with diverse range of ancestors, you should definitely try this one before you kno...”
“This is such a great strain for sleep disorders.  Very sweet smoke, sparkly with crystals... love this one.  I find it's best right before bedtime.  Sleep like a log.”
“Most eurphoric strain I've ever had..”
“Fruity Zesty Dense Quality Strain. Would recommend for any experinced user.”

“Great night-time high, helps stiffness in joints and instantly soothes muscles. Stress and depression lifted away, and calmness eases you to sleep. Puts you in a euphoric, good mood before retiring for the evening.”
“slept like a baby for the first time in a long time thanksntonthis strain.  stilled the mind/body and dulled my pain.”

“Easily my favorite indica dominant strain I have tried.  Vaporized in a Flowermate V5.0s.  
New to this whole thing, but to me the flavor was not unpleasant, but best described as sweetened fresh cut grass.”
“I'm indulging this strain via a Hush" vape cartridge. It takes a lot to get me there
“Heavy feeling in the head, all of my pain is gone, I suffer from Lupus so that's a huge thing to have all your pain just disappear.”
